raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "spectrafit" %}
{% set version = "0.12.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/spectrafit-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2767a78324eb2e39ff1089b7e2ee37a50ae368ab0fc4a38fc9bf12594db1036c

build:
  skip: true  # [py>=311]
  number: 0

outputs:
  - name: {{ name }}
    build:
      script: python -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv
      entry_points:
      - spectrafit = spectrafit.spectrafit:command_line_runner
      - spectrafit-converter = spectrafit.plugins.converter:command_line_runner
    requirements:
      host:
        - python >=3.7, <3.11
        - poetry >=1.1,<1.2
        - pip
      run:
        - python
        - pyyaml >=6.0,<7.0
        - ascii-art >=5.7,<6.0
        - emcee >=3.1.2,<4.0.0
        - lmfit >=1.0.3,<2.0.0
        - numdifftools >=0.9.39,<0.10.0
        - openpyxl >=3.0.9,<4.0.0
        - pydantic >=1.10.1,<2.0.0
        - scikit-learn >=1.0.2,<2.0.0
        - seaborn >=0.11.2,<0.12.0
        - tabulate >=0.8.10,<0.10.0
        - tomli-w >=1.0.0,<2.0.0
        - tomli >=2.0.1,<3.0.0
        - tqdm >=4.64.0,<5.0.0
        - pandas ==1.3.5  # [py<38]
        - pandas >=1.5.0,<2.0.0  # [py>=38]
        - numpy ==1.21.6  # [py<38]
        - numpy >=1.23.4,<2.0.0  # [py>=38]
        - pydantic >=1.10.1,<2.0.0
    test:
      imports:
        - spectrafit
      commands:
        - pip check
        - spectrafit --help
        - spectrafit-converter --help
      requires:
        - pip
  - name: {{ name }}-jupyter
    build:
      skip: true
      entry_points:
      - spectrafit = spectrafit.spectrafit:command_line_runner
      - spectrafit-converter = spectrafit.plugins.converter:command_line_runner
      - spectrafit-jupyter = spectrafit.app.app:jupyter
    requirements:
      host:
        - python >=3.7, <3.11
        - poetry >=1.1,<1.2
        - pip
      run:
        - python
        - {{ pin_subpackage('spectrafit', exact=True) }}
        - jupyterlab >=3.4.5,<4.0.0
        - plotly >=5.10.0,<6.0.0
        - python-kaleido ==0.2.1
        - itables >=1.3.0,<2.0.0
        - dtale >=2.8.1,<3.0.0
    test:
      imports:
        - spectrafit
      commands:
        - pip check
        - spectrafit --help
        - spectrafit-jupyter --help
        - python -c "from spectrafit.plugins.notebook import SpectraFitNotebook"
      requires:
        - pip

about:
  home: https://pypi.org/project/spectrafit/
  summary: Fast fitting of 2D-Spectra with established routines
  description: >-
    SpectraFit is a command-line and Jupyter-notebook tool for quick data-fitting based on the regular expression of distribution functions.
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://anselmoo.github.io/spectrafit/
  dev_url: https://github.com/anselmoo/spectrafit

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - Anselmoo
  feedstock-name: spectrafit
